Title: MCEController
Description: MCEController is a Blackberry application to control the Microsoft Media Center. It uses VMCController as a backend on the Windows side (also available on Codeplex). MCEController makes of of the OS 5.0 APIs and WIFI, so itÂ´s only usable on devices like the Curve or the Bold.
HomeWiki:
Project Description
MCEController is a Blackberry application to control the Microsoft Media Center. It uses VMCController as a backend on the Windows side (also available on Codeplex). MCEController makes of of the OS 5.0 APIs and WIFI, so it´s only usable on devices like the Curve or the Bold.

Help Wanted
You are welcome to participate in this project. Drop me a line if you are interested.
